name: 2223Y1C_Carmack_Moon Skedaddle
description: In this platformer game, players control a conscious, spherical, failed science experiment attempting to escape from a top-secret lab on the moon. The game features 4 levels with various hazards and challenges, such as moving platforms, pressure plates, gates, slippery and destructible surfaces. The character's deliberate movement includea chargeable jump and  a dash in 3 directions. Frequent checkpoints are available, and failing to jump results in  being caught by the facilities security. The objective is to complete all 4 levels and escape the facility.
